SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.animatedblock

Interface IAnimatedBlockData

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleBlockData
public interface IAnimatedBlockData
Represents the internal data of an animated block.

These data represent a representation of the block in the structure as it is in the world.

  • Method Details

    • canRotate

      boolean canRotate()
      Checks if this block can rotate.
      Returns:
      True if this block can rotate.

    • rotateBlock

      default boolean rotateBlock(MovementDirection movementDirection)
      Rotates this block in a provided MovementDirection.
      Parameters:
      movementDirection - The MovementDirection to rotate this block in.
      Returns:
      True if the block was rotated.

    • rotateBlock

      boolean rotateBlock(MovementDirection movementDirection, int times)
      Rotates this block in a provided MovementDirection.
      Parameters:
      movementDirection - The MovementDirection to rotate this block in.
      times - The number times to apply the rotation.
      Returns:
      True if the block was rotated.

    • putBlock

      void putBlock(IVector3D loc)
      Parameters:
      loc - The position where the block will be placed.

    • deleteOriginalBlock

      void deleteOriginalBlock()
      Deletes the block at the original location.

    • postProcessStructureRemoval

      default void postProcessStructureRemoval()
      Called after all blocks in a structure have been removed for any potential post-processing.

      Subclasses can override this method if they need to do any post-processing, such as updating the physics around the edges of the empty space where the structure used to be.
